name: Distressed 'VAMP' Hoodie
description: Heavyweight cotton hoodie with a distressed, washed-out finish. Features cryptic graphics and an oversized, batwing silhouette.

name: Cargo Bondage Trousers
description: Multi-pocket cargo pants in waxed canvas with detachable bondage straps. A staple of the antagonist uniform.

name: Anarchy Leather Jacket
description: Hand-distressed grain leather jacket with custom silver hardware and an asymmetrical zip. Built for the night.

name: Monolith Combat Boots
description: Exaggerated platform combat boots crafted from matte leather. Features a brutalist silhouette and a side-zip closure.

name: Phantom Knit Balaclava
description: Distressed knit balaclava with a deconstructed weave. Full face coverage for maximum anonymity.

name: Chrome Cross Pendant
description: Solid sterling silver pendant with a brutalist, gothic design. Hangs from a heavy 24-inch chain.

name: Spiked Leather Choker
description: Genuine leather choker with polished steel spikes and an adjustable buckle closure. Raw and refined.

name: Silver Armor Ring Set
description: A set of three interlocking sterling silver rings designed to mimic gothic armor. Articulated for movement.

name: Barbed Wire Leather Belt
description: Thick leather belt featuring a custom-molded barbed wire-style buckle in tarnished silver.

name: Narcissist No. 00
description: A dark, unisex fragrance with notes of leather, gasoline, and burnt vanilla. Unforgettable and unapologetic.

name: Antagonist No. 01
description: A sharp, metallic scent with top notes of blood orange and cold steel, softened by a base of black musk.

name: Cathedral No. 02
description: An atmospheric fragrance evoking cold stone, ancient incense, and oud. A scent for silent rooms and late nights.
